title: Tortured Soul
description:
'Bound not by blood but by loyaltyWe live, we ride, and we dieby our own laws'The club is my outlet.A playground where I can set my demons free without judgment.I never expected to be anyone's savior.But when an instinct I thought had died inside me takes overI’m left with no choice.Now she’s here with me,Imprisoned by her attachment to a real life monsterAnd it’s only a matter of time before she remembers where she really belongs.I thought I knew pain.That I’d suffered enough torture to last me a lifetime.
Turns out I was wrong…
author: Emma Creed
